meanings.sent1: The committee will homologate the decision tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The judge will homologate the contract after reviewing it.
meanings.sent3: I hope they homologate my request for a day off!
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to homologate the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The stamp of approval homologated their success.

meanings.sent1: The supervisor will homologate the document once it's complete.
meanings.sent2: The notary public will homologate the will as per legal requirements.
meanings.sent3: Can you homologate my excuse for being late?
meanings.sent4: His signature homologated the authenticity of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The certificate will homologate your qualifications for the job.
